name: SOC NO WAY HOME BULLET HELL JAM
name_original: SOC NO WAY HOME BULLET HELL JAM
description:
FIRST GAME JAM 

10 days to make a bullet hell game!

Its time to get back to the 329 after a long night of partying, you decide to take the dike home. As you see the sign for no wheeled vehicles on the dike you wonder if your hoverboard will be in violation of this rule. Avoid Officer Burgerz and his minions as they unleash a BULLET HELL on your way home!

CONTROLS

WASD MOVEMENT 

SPACE JUMP

PAUSE ESCx2

Known Bugs 

more then one life taken away 

shot into map
